name: Kawaiiland
description:
Kawaiiland When evil creatures emerge bringing chaos to the island of cuteness, a group of adventurers must gather to rekawaiize the island.

This is an game of rpg; adventure; a lot of humor; for all ages; and free for all audiences! The game is in its beta version, and will have some updates until the final version. You can play it for free  (~*~*)~💛but consider supporting the game development if you like it, you can also help by filling out the form that comes with it (or clicking here), in the form, you can make suggestions; criticisms; questions; etc... I'll appreciate everything you can tell me! ^w^ I wish you great fun!

Story

Kawaiiland, land of the cuteness, is an island inhabited by various types of creatures, home of the tiny pixies; of the vegetal ones, yasainians; and of the very cute, kemonomiminians! Outside its prevailing population, Kawaiiland often receives visits of other creatures races from the tourism of allied kingdoms.

But not all visitors are good visitors. A mysterious being, self-named The Big Villain, threatened to get rid of Kawaiiland cuteness and dominate Desu Kingdom, releasing evil creatures stored in his iDevil. However, he failed in his plan and managed to escape. At least that's what seemed to have happened so far. What is know, is that the place won't be the same until everyone are free of the evil creatures.

Now, Kawaiiland needs brave battlers willing to purify the island of these beings, so that it returns to be completely kawaii as usual.

Gameplay In game
  • Tutorials in game;
  • Different and balanced skills;
  • Gathering system;
  • Windows skin models to change the game theme;
  • Anti-lag system (it helps a bit);
  • Challenging difficulty;
  • Autosave;
In future updates
  • Skill Tree;
  • Editable character names;
  • Continuation of the history;
  • Dungeon;
  • New Bosses;
  • New itens;
  • New NPCs;
  • Best drops;
  • More quests;
  • Fast Travel;
